name: BioRefining Alliance
memberOrga: DONG Energy, Landbrug & Fødevarer, Novozymes, Haldor Topsøe, Niras Klima og Energi, Vestforsyning Erhverv, Københavns Universitet, Aarhus Universitet, DTU, Danske Halmleverandører & Danske Maskinstationer og Entreprenører.
goal: The alliance works to promote advanced biorefining based on residues from farming/forestry ad waste. The Alliance looks upon advanced biorefining as one of the nessecary pathways to substitute fossil fuels within transport, fodder, chemicals etc. and as a great opportunity to create new innovation and jobs within industri and farming/forestry.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives: Waste directive (circular economy package), REDII, non-ETS regulation, plastic strategies, BBI
